snippet.title: Fallen Frontier - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Moonshot Games invites you to experience Fallen Frontier, a 2D sidescrolling shooter offering fast-paced tactical combat, vast interconnected worlds, and an original hard sci-fi universe. Using firearms, grenades, and various special abilities, you'll confront, confound, and conquer your enemies.

We're still hard at work on the game, and aim to release in early 2012. For more information about Fallen Frontier, visit http://www.moonshotgames.com
